scripts.install-all: npm run install:config && npm run install:appCore && npm run install:app1React && npm run install:app2Angular && npm run install:app3Angular1 && npm run install:app4vue && npm run install:app5Angular && npm run install:appCommonDeps && npm run install:appDevice  && npm run install:appNavbar
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail -p name --names " run appCore & app1React & app2Angular & app3Angular1 & app4vue & app5Angular & appAdapter & appCommonDeps & appDevice & appNavbar" "npm run start:appCore" "npm run start:app1React" "npm run start:app2Angular" "npm run start:app3Angular1" "npm run start:app4vue" "npm run start:app5Angular" "npm run start:appAdapter" "npm run start:appCommonDeps" "npm run start:appDevice" "npm run start:appNavbar"
